label: 蓑虫山人
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: A skillfull but still little-known painter in the literary" (bunjinga) tradition, frequented Chōboji, where he died and is buried (p. 328).  [土岐源吾、文人画、長母寺] "
